Package ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Controller.ATasks

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    changeUsernameTask
    Provides an AsyncTask subclass that processes a request to change a User object's username field in the elastic search database.
    favouriteTask
    Provides an AsyncTask subclass that processes a request to add a Content object to a User object's favourites field in the elastic search database.
    getFavouritesTask
    Provides an AsyncTask subclass that processes a request to get the data stored in a User object's favourites field from the elastic search database.
    getQuestionListTask
    Provides an AsyncTask subclass that processes a request to get a list of Question objects stored in the elastic search database.
    getQuestionTask
    Provides an AsyncTask subclass that processes a request to get a single Question object stored in the elastic search database.
    saveToDeviceTask
    Provides an AsyncTask subclass that saves a Question, referenced by ID, to the devices local memory.
    searchQuestionTask  
    signinTask
    Provides an AsyncTask subclass that processes a request "sign in" a user.
    submitAnswerTask
    Provides an AsyncTask subclass that processes a request to store an Answer object in the elastic search database.
    submitQuestionTask  
    submitReplyTask  
    upvoteTask
    Provides an AsyncTask subclass that processes a request to add an upvote associated with a given user to a Content object.
